content:
During the battle era, the occupiers made 9 aviation strikes in the Orikhiv direction, using 10 managed airbombs and about 3 dozen unmanaged aviation missiles.

About thisreportedDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

Continuing the terror of the civilian population of the frontal territories of Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhya and Kherson regions, the enemy applied 191 FPV-Dron, 6 shock UAVs of the Lannti type and dropped out of different modifications from the drones of various modifications 163.

In Zaporozhye, a civilian was injured in a car in the car.

In the Kherson region, the FPV-Drone was injured by two civilians. Private apartment building was damaged.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat tonight our air defense has shot down 58 out of 60 Shahanedov, launched by Russia.
title: In the Orikhiv direction, the enemy per day used 10 cabins and about 30 aviation missiles
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. Continuing the terror of civilians ...
author: Army Inform
